1.content:
Okay. First thing's first. What kind of giantess is Cindy, why does she want to take an earthling as her apprentice, and what kind of person would her apprentice need to be?

1) She is a gentle giantess. She came to earth after hearing how much less advanced our society was than hers and, feeling sorry for us, she decided to aid humanity's progress in any way she could. She decided to find an apprentice to support her on her mission. She wouldn't intentionally harm a human without a very good reason (ie: self defense), and she would never kill anyone on purpose, no matter what the circumstances. She has a kind heart, and cares deeply for all those around her. To her, size doesn't matter; if it's a sentient life-form, then it's treated with respect and equality. The human that she picks as her apprentice would have to be a gentle soul who would be willing to dedicate her life to helping society.

2) She is an evil giantess. She came to earth after discovering it as a planet whose lifeforms were all much smaller than her and, seeing it as a world that she could easily conquer, she decided to make it hers. She decided to find an apprentice to aid her in her conquest of the earth. After all, every ruler needs a second-in-command. She is truly sadistic, and takes great pleasure in torturing her victims to the point of tears before finally finishing them off. She sees anyone weaker than her as nothing more than dirt, and treats them accordingly. However, if someone surrenders to her willingly, she'll be a bit more generous to them; she'll only keep them as a pet/slave instead of killing them on the spot. The human that she chooses as her apprentice would have to be a merciless and destructive force who would not hesitate to extinguish the lives of anyone who opposed her.

3) She is a playful giantess. She came to earth on a whim after passing by our planet on a vacation across the galaxy. Seeing that the planet's society was so small, and thinking that they all looked like toys to her, she decided to spend the rest of her vacation here. She decided to find an apprentice so that she would have someone to hang out with. It would be too lonely for her otherwise. She doesn't intentionally go out of her way to try to cause harm to people, but she still doesn't mind if there are a few casualties after one of her games. She is only out to have fun; nothing more, nothing less. The person that she picks as her apprentice would have to be a free spirit just like her, and have a lot of energy to spend hours playing games with her.

4) She is an intellectual giantess. She came to earth while journeying through space to make an interstellar map and, finding the earth as a very interesting planet with many unique lifeforms, she decided to spend some time on this planet to learn more about it's inhabitants. She decided to adopt an apprentice so that she would be able to have someone to teach her about earth's society first-hand. She also felt that it would be nice to have someone to teach about her own planet's way of life. She doesn't try to needlessly cause damage to society, but sometimes she can't resist the urge to take something apart and see how it works. She is a very curious type, and greatly enjoys learning new things. The person that she chooses to be her apprentice would have to be someone who is fairly intelligent, and would be able to efficiently explain the earthlings' way of life to her.

5) Other
1.title: An alien goddess and her new apprentice...

11.title: A gentle giantess & her pupil

111.content:
Cindy was a very kind woman. When word of the a small world with a very limited technological advancement reached her planet, she immediately began to feel sorry for them. Taking pity on this small planet known as earth, Cindy decided to take it upon herself to help improve the lives of these people. She immediately flew off into space, and used her powers to warp straight to her destination. Within moments, Cindy was floating in the air directly above the planet that she intended to aid.

She was amazed at how much smaller the planet was than her own. As she flew through the atmosphere of the tiny blue planet, she was able to see just how much bigger she was than the earthlings. They appeared to be nothing more than 4 inches tall compared to her! She quickly realized that she would have trouble interacting with this species without causing them fear. She was simply too big for them to not freak out at the sight of her.

She tried to think of a course of action that could solve this issue without causing panic, but she couldn't think of anything. As depressing as it was, her ability to control the size of objects was limited to growth. Sure she could return things to there original size after growing them, but she wasn't able to shrink anything beyond that point. After several more minutes of thought, Cindy had an idea: if she couldn't shrink herself to human size, she could find a suitable human and make them grow to her size. Perhaps these people would react better if they were approached by one of their own kind. Cindy realized that she would need to be careful with her choice of who to grow. After all, not everyone would have as good intentions as her. They could easily end up taking advantage of the size that she granted them.

She used her powers to search through the nearby human cities in order to find a suitable apprentice. Eventually, she found three different people who seemed to be reasonable options, she had always also wanted a daughter like figure so she narrowed it down to three choices:

First was Cathy a cute blonde 6 year old who was short for six but seemingly exceedingly kind and energetic she had been seen helping an elderly woman across a busy street despite her age age and size when Cindy observed her.

Second was Amy a cute 8 year old also blonde and equally as kind as Cathy but also woefully short for her age. Cindy observed her struggling to carry groceries to a Senior Citizens Care Home.

Third and lastly was Lily a cute 9 year old as kind as the last two with Auburn hair and green eyes not unlike the other two girls but again short for her age. Somehow despite being bullied more than other two combined at school, by bullies as well as by family she somehow remained kind though secretly wishing her older brother and sister would at least not pick on her. Cindy found her struggling to volunteer at the homeless shelter doing little things like giving out sandwiches and snacks

In the end it was a hard choice but Cindy chose....
111.title: 6-9 (child)

choices: Cathy grows to 75ft tall and begins learning from Cindy
Cathy grows to 50ft tall and begins to learn
Someone sees Cathy grow and freaks out
1111.content:
"Well aren't you a kind little girl, thank you dearie, I only hope you remain this way in your youth, many become less, respectful to us older folk." The old woman said as Cindy helped her cross the street.

"I'll do my best." Cathy smiled as the two crossed finally reaching the other side.

"Say, shouldn't you be in school dearie?" The elderly woman said.

"Nope, its Saturday, no school!" Cathy said politely yet still excited. "Is there anything else you need?" She tilted her head curious.

"Ah yes, so it is, sometimes I forget the date, it all goes by so fast." The elder smiled. "No no I can manage from here but thank you for your kindness." The Elderly woman reached into her purse.

"No thank you!" Cathy said gently placing her hand on the Elder's.

"Not even a dollar?" The old woman smiled. "How gentle and kind you are my dear." Cathy smiled.

"Thank you for the compliment! See you later!" She then walked off with a smile.

"You are so gentle." A voice spoke in her mind.

"Eh?" Cathy looked around. "Huh..." She shrugged and began walking once more. Cindy exited her ship making herself and the ship invisible as she slowly descended landing on the ground.

"Dear child, would you be willing to help ALL human?" Cindy's voice once more reached Cathy's mind.

"Uhhhhhhh she looked around again."

"I'm speaking to you via telepathy." Cathy was confused by the word. "It means to your mind, my thoughts reach your mind, you merely need to think to speak to me child."


Cathy thought to herself "Like this? Can you hear me uh...Ma'am?"

"Yes that is perfect! My name is Cindy my dear, and you are?"

"Cathy it's a pleasure to meet you Ma'am!"

"Oh, you may call me Cindy dear."

"It's...a bit odd calling an adult by their first name Ma'am. It will take time for me to get used to." Cathy was unsure but she did enjoy talking to this woman (Or who she assumed was another human somehow)

"Then how about 'Teacher' that is if you accept my offer."

"About helping humans? Oh and uh...what or where are you?" Cathy looked around some more "I'm sorry I didn't-" She was cut off by Cindy's gentle laughter which oddly made Cathy smile. It was heartwarming actually.

"I'm an alien, I know it's hard to believe." Cathy nodded. "Well take a look up for me then dear?" Cathy did so then took a step back in shock, the 100ft woman was terrifying but only for a moment.

"C-can't anyone else see you?" She thought.

"No, just you, my technology allows me to chose who I reveal myself to based on DNA sequences and-" She stopped when she saw Cathy's look of confusion. "The short version is I am here to help humanity, however...there's a problem, I cannot shrink myself any smaller than this, and if others saw me they would likely be terrified of me, I do not want that, I do not wish to harm anyone either, so, what I want to do is make you, a human grow, you'll be a VERY tall girl. Then I will tell you what to say to them along with the do's and don't with your new size. Of course you do not have to accept this. i won't-"


"How big will I be?!" Cathy chirped excited. "Sorry, that was rude!" She sighed. "I'm really sorry Ma'am"

"it's fine, you're excited and this is new to you, if you do not mind, I am going to teleport you outside the city, that is if you wish to grow!"

"YES PLEASE!!!" Cathy almost yelled aloud.

"Excellent and thank you for accepting this. It's very helpful."
1111.title: Cathy

112.content:
Cindy was a very kind woman. When word of the a small world with a very limited technological advancement reached her planet, she immediately began to feel sorry for them. Taking pity on this small planet known as earth, Cindy decided to take it upon herself to help improve the lives of these people. She immediately flew off into space, and used her powers to warp straight to her destination. Within moments, Cindy was floating in the air directly above the planet that she intended to aid.

She was amazed at how much smaller the planet was than her own. As she flew through the atmosphere of the tiny blue planet, she was able to see just how much bigger she was than the earthlings. They appeared to be nothing more than 4 inches tall compared to her! She quickly realized that she would have trouble interacting with this species without causing them fear. She was simply too big for them to not freak out at the sight of her.

She tried to think of a course of action that could solve this issue without causing panic, but she couldn't think of anything. As depressing as it was, her ability to control the size of objects was limited to growth. Sure she could return things to there original size after growing them, but she wasn't able to shrink anything beyond that point. After several more minutes of thought, Cindy had an idea: if she couldn't shrink herself to human size, she could find a suitable human and make them grow to her size. Perhaps these people would react better if they were approached by one of their own kind. Cindy realized that she would need to be careful with her choice of who to grow. After all, not everyone would have as good intentions as her. They could easily end up taking advantage of the size that she granted them.

She used her powers to search through the nearby human cities in order to find a suitable apprentice. Eventually, she found three different people who seemed to be reasonable options, she had always also wanted a daughter like figure so she narrowed it down to three choices:


First was Ann a cute 10 year old blonde with blue eyes, that was short for her age but exceedingly kind. She had always been seen by Cindy volunteering to help the teachers out and was seen as teachers pet and "A Goody Two Shoes" by her peers for this.

Second was a unique thing Cindy encountered, A Pair of twins that she might both make her apprentices. Tracy and Stacy were identical twin blonde 12 year old with green eyes and both were well endowed for their age Tracy having B Cup breasts and Stacy nearly a C Cup despite them having average height for their ages. Tracy was more of of tomboy while Stacy was the girly girl but both were exceedingly kind. The two having just outgrown the girl scouts volunteered to be the pilots for the local troops Junior Head Scout/Troop Leader Training Program as well as donating their rare blood type blood to local blood drives on occasion with parental consent of course.

Third and last was Lizzy a mousey type 12 year old red head with Hazel eyes who was slightly tall and well endowed for her age with B nearly C cup breasts already however because she wore glasses and often had her nose in books she was seen as a nerd. That coupled with her slight shyness meant she had almost no friends. Despite this she was kind and managed to volunteer at the hospital her parents worked at in the " Junior Volunteer" program

A Tough choice for Cindy but in the end she chose....

Taking pity on this small planet known as earth, Cindy decided to take it upon herself to help improve the lives of these people. She immediately flew off into space, and used her powers to warp straight to her destination. Within moments, Cindy was floating in the air directly above the planet that she intended to aid.

She was amazed at how much smaller the planet was than her own. As she flew through the atmosphere of the tiny blue planet, she was able to see just how much bigger she was than the earthlings. They appeared to be nothing more than 4 inches tall compared to her! She quickly realized that she would have trouble interacting with this species without causing them fear. She was simply too big for them to not freak out at the sight of her.

She tried to think of a course of action that could solve this issue without causing panic, but she couldn't think of anything. As depressing as it was, her ability to control the size of objects was limited to growth. Sure she could return things to there original size after growing them, but she wasn't able to shrink anything beyond that point. After several more minutes of thought, Cindy had an idea: if she couldn't shrink herself to human size, she could find a suitable human and make them grow to her size. Perhaps these people would react better if they were approached by one of their own kind. Cindy realized that she would need to be careful with her choice of who to grow. After all, not everyone would have as good intentions as her. They could easily end up taking advantage of the size that she granted them.

She used her powers to search through the nearby human cities in order to find a suitable apprentice. Eventually, she found three different people who seemed to be reasonable choices.

First was Melissa, a beautiful 23 year old girl with a caring personality. She had long black hair that flowed straight down to her shoulders, and an impressive figure that would make many women jealous. She appeared to be a kindergarten teacher, and was taking great joy in seeing the smiles on her student's faces. The students flocked to her like baby ducks to their mother, and she made sure to pay attention to each of them. She was clearly someone who cared about others, and would make a fitting assistant for Cindy's quest to aid humanity.

Second was Amy, a young woman at 19 years old. She was already fairly large compared to most other humans, standing at 6' 2'' tall. She was smiling while helping a young boy retrieve his kite from a tree as Cindy noticed her, which gave the impression of her being a very friendly girl. As for her appearance, she was a bit on the skinny side, as it appeared that all of her fat had been put into her huge DD breasts. Her blond hair was tied into a ponytail, and she had a single strand of hair hanging in front of her face. Over all, she was quite attractive, and her first impression left Cindy to assume she would make a good choice as well.

Lastly was Sandra, a gentle 20 year old woman. Her short red hair was kept out of her face with a sweatband, which she wore often. She always felt that she had to help out society, and put in a lot of time doing volunteer work. Due to the outdoor activities involved in this, she had a light tan and fairly toned muscles. She didn't look like a bodybuilder by any means, but her physique was still very well maintained. The only thing she hated about her body was her small bust size. Her boobs were on par with an elementary school student, and she got depressed easily when this topic was brought up. Over all, her appearance made her look a bit like a tomboy. Despite this, her personality was anything but. She was a caring woman who loved to help others. She might have been the best choice of the three.

After a bit of contemplation, Cindy decides to enlarge _______________, and take her on as her apprentice.
114.title: A Peaceful Visitor

choices: Cindy makes Sandra gently outgrow the tub she's in

1143.content:
The redheaded Sandra was Cindy's ultimate choice. There was nothing the goddess loved and respected more then someone who put others above themselves, Sandra was just that and it was clear she was meant to be Cindy's apprentice.

Only question was how would Cindy get her attention? She could simply reach out and speak to her telepathically but Cindy was wise to know that Sandra may freak out if she started hearing voices in her head. So instead she waited watching the redhead go through her day. Volunteer work, doing her elderly neighbor a kindness and planting a flower or two, and finally babysitting the daughter of her across the street neighbor.

Cindy smiled pleased and impressed with all the act of kindness Sandra had accomplished during her day. She had definitely chosen the right person. Meanwhile the redhead stretched her tired arms and she entered her small home. It was tiring work but her heart was in the right place so Sandra couldn't complain. Removing her signature sweatband allowing her short locks to sway free the young woman prepared to take a quick bath.

"Ahhh" The soothing feel of the water all across her fit form felt divine. Closing her eyes it was almost as if she could lose herself in the bath. Her body and mind completely relaxed at the moment. Cindy quickly realizing this was a great opportunity for her to speak with Sandra.

"Hello there, young Sandra."

"Huh? Wha?"

As expected the redhead was rather surprised when she heard Cindy's call out to her.

"Who's there?!"

Sandra was a kind person but once she had build up her muscles a bit she took it to the next level of learning some self-defense. Just because she a friend to everyone didn't mean she couldn't kick your backside.

"My apologizes if I startled you. My intentions are not evil nor do I intent you any harm but I do need you or listen to what I have to say and keep your mind open to what I have to tell you."

Curious yet understandingly not entirely trusting of Cindy Sandra decided to play along for now.

"Excellent now let me explain..."

And so Cindy went on to explain how she had come to earth and how she had come across and chosen Sandra as her potential apprentice. It was an unbelievable tale yet oddly Sandra found herself believing in the otherworldly voice of the goddess.

But she needed some proof to Cindy's claims.

1241.content:
Cindy had arrived on earth less than a day ago, but she was already enjoying herself by destroying a small city near the area where she landed. She had just finished her conquest of this city. It was relatively easy for her to do, but it had taken her quite some time to get these puny humans to submit to her. She was irritated by how long it took her to take over one measly city, and didn't even want to think about how long it would take her to become ruler of the entire planet! If it took her almost a full day to bring a small city to its knees, then a larger one might actually pose a challenge.

She knew that there was nothing that these humans could do to harm her, but the fact that they kept putting up these useless struggles against her and refusing to surrender meant that taking over the tiny planet wouldn't be as easy as she once thought. She had expected that they would simply cower in fear at the sight of her and surrender immediately to save themselves from destruction. She didn't particularly want to have to do any hard work to make the world hers. She decided that if she was going to have to spend so much time knocking some sense into this pathetically stubborn species, she would need some help to make things a bit easier. She scanned the wreckage of the city to find a person who she could take under her wing.

After searching or several minutes, a particular human caught her eye. She was a blond woman with a fairly large bust and a beautiful figure, who appeared to be about 20 years old. Her flawless appearance wasn't what grabbed Cindy's attention, however. It was what she was doing that interested her: This blond bombshell was in the middle of a dark alley, surrounded by four men, and was single-handedly beating the crap out of them! She had already knocked three of them unconscious, and had the fourth man in a scissor-hold. Cindy walked closer to observe as this woman had her legs wrapped tightly around the helpless man's neck. The man eventually lost consciousness just like his partners had, and the woman stood over him triumphantly.

"Ha! That's what you get for underestimating me! Remember to bring at least twice as many guys next time if you want to even have a chance of bringing me down!"

As the woman finished up her victory speech, the sound of someone clapping grabbed her attention. She turned around to stare up at the massive form of the giantess who had just leveled the city. Most people would have been terrified by this sight, but she simply smiled.

"Hey, aren't you the one who destroyed this city? What do you want with me?"

Cindy simply chuckled at the tiny woman. The vicious attitude, the fearlessness, and gorgeous to boot! She really liked this one.

"I have to say, human, I'm impressed. Not only did you take out four men at once, but you even had the courage to stand up to me! Yes, I think that you're exactly what I'm looking for..."

"What do you mean by that?"

"Quite simple, little human. I want to take you on as my apprentice. Join me in my conquest of this puny planet, & you can rule by my side and crush all who dare to oppose you! Just imagine the power that I can give you! You could be-"

Cindy was then cut off by the woman's quick response.

"Heck! No need to try and convince me! This sounds like a whole lot of fun! Where do I sign up?"

"Hahahahaha! I like your style little human... Tell me, what's your name?"

"The name's Alyssa. And you?"

"My name is Cindy. And from now on you shall be Goddess Alyssa, my loyal second in command!"

Cindy then extended her hand toward Alyssa. Her hand suddenly began glowing, and Alyssa's body began to grow. Within moments, Alyssa had grown to the same size as Cindy herself: an incredible 100 feet tall! She spent a moment to take in the sights at her new size, and then turned to Cindy. She reached out to give her a handshake.

"Cindy, I think that you and me are gonna become great friends!"

"I couldn't agree more, my apprentice. Now, shall we get started?"

"Yeah! Let's bring this world to its knees!"

The duo then walked out of the city. Alyssa took the time to knock over her first building before they left. She was amazed at how easy it was, and Cindy giggled at how her apprentice seemed to be born for this sort of thing. She then says:
1241.title: Alyssa's rise to power

12413.content:
"You really are a natural at this! Maybe we should take things up a notch..." Cindy giggled deviously.

"What did you have in mind?" her apprentice smirked.

"Well, as I told you, I plan on conquering this planet and its pathetic inhabitants, but it's taking much longer than expected. Your people are quite the resilient little bugs."

"Please, Cindy, don't ever loop me in with those weak little insects ever again," Alyssa demanded. "I was human, but I have ascended into a goddess now. Now, these little humans are nothing but annoying pests that don't deserve to gaze upon my ascended form."

"My word, Alyssa, you shall make a fine goddess indeed!" Cindy praised. "Now, as I was saying, I wish to rule over this world as soon as possible, so I think a more intimidating figure is needed, don't you think?"

"But of course! Let's do this!"

"Excellent! Get ready!"

With but a simple thought, Cindy focused on both her own and Alyssa's bodies and began to infuse them with her own mystical energy. Once the connection had been established, the original giantess sighed in pleasure as she broke her focus, causing her and her apprentice to rapidly climb in height.

"Bow before your goddesses, you insignificant germs!" Alyssa commanded as she watched the city shrink before her very eyes. The humans within the city merely looked up in both shock and awe as both girls grew taller and taller with ease, their increasing shadows slowly beginning to cover sections of the city in a wave of darkness.

After about 30 seconds of solid expansion, the two women's growth spurts came to a halt.

"Now this is more like it!" Alyssa laughed as she glared down at the minuscule city before her.

"This size will do nicely...for now at least," Cindy chuckled sinisterly. "I should've been this large right from the beginning!"

"Ya know, Cindy," the beautiful blonde goddess began, "we have an old saying on this planet: 'Bigger. Is. Better.'"

"That's such a wonderful little quote, dear," the stronger being giggled. "I do hope this'll be enough. I made us equivalent to 750 feet tall in your Earth measurements. We should have no problem bending this world to our will now. And of course, if ever the need arises, we shall become even stronger!"

"That sounds perfect! Now, shall we begin?"

"Let's!"
12413.title: Destruction on a Larger Scale

choices: "Cindy, don't you want to join in?"
124131.content:
Almost before Cindy had finished speaking Alyssa had planted a booted foot on a collection of houses, as she looked down she could already feel herself tensing with pleasure...

"Take that!", she shouted.

Soon she was off, stomping the whole neighborhood, marveling at the debris which flew up in the air. She didn't pay any attention to the screams of the helpless citizens below her as she squashed the neighborhood to pulp.

"You little worms are no match for me, hahaha! I used to be the same size as you, scumbags... Well, now I am a goddess to all of you! As such, I expect you to bow down to me and submit to will; if there are any of you bugs left, that is!".

With that, she noticed a big highway full of fleeing citizens in their cars and any other vehicle they could find, escaping the increasing destruction. Crouching down in the newly created ruins and resting her black leather gloved left hand on a nearby factory which inevitably collapsed, she bent down to look closer at the fleeing insects in their vehicles, each insect no more than half inch high in their inch and a bit long tin boxes. She got so close that the terrified people could smell the leather of her skin tight catsuit and the aroma of her very obvious cleavage. The next thing that happened surprised even her, though she enjoyed watching it happen all the same. As she leaned over, the pendant she was wearing around her neck swung and crashed into several of the fleeing cars, taking many out...

"That's sooooo cooool!" She purred.

She then karate chopped the highway, creating a big chasm in the road with cracks either side. The vibrations caused many nearby structures to collapse. She then swept her gloved hand towards her, causing numerous cars and other objects to pile up against the advancing black wall. The speed of the casual sweep caused many cars to fly through the air and explode in impact with whatever they landed on. The sweep was over very quickly and as the noise started settling down the air was filled with laughter...

Cindy couldn't believe her eyes. Her new protege was taking to conquest like a duck to water, and she really seemed to be enjoying it! She was one of them not very long before, but now she was relentlessly destroying everything in sight! Alyssa now stood there, her latex clad arms folded across her ample chest, which lifted up her cleavage that was already straining against her latex corset. Her platform boots themselves were buried in the remains of some neighborhood houses... Both Alyssa and Cindy simply looked around at the destruction and marveled.
124131.title: Destruction!

1241311.content:
'Well' Cindy thought, 'I have made an excellent choice,'.

She grabbed a hand of fleeing people in her hand. Her eyes glued to Alyssa, she continued to watch the new giantess. At the moment, a new helicopter was slowly being flattened inch by inch between her fingers. Grabbing a couple minuscule humans in her hands, Cindy meditatively chewed on them. She would keep watching Alyssa for a while. After all, she could always join in at any time. Laughing silently to herself, she consumed a few more human popcorn pieces and contentedly demolished a house with her foot.

Alyssa was happier than she'd ever been in her life. She'd craved power from day one, and now that she had it she didn't hold back. Entire blocks demolished beneath her feet. Skyscrapers smashed to pieces. She lovingly recreated scenes from every giant monster movie she'd ever seen. After an initial moment of hesitance, she devoured two people she'd caught on a rooftop. The moment of indecision puzzled her. She'd already massacred hundreds, probably thousands of tiny people. Why did two more matter? But the second they hit her tongue, doubts vanished. Two tinies squirming, liable to be crushed by merely her tongue? This was truly all the power she'd ever wanted. Alyssa savored their taste as she swallowed them, and her last vestiges of guilt, alive.

After that moment, she poured as many as she could into her mouth. The taste, texture, and tingling as they frantically fought for their lives inside her mouth was too much to pass up. But finally, her hunger was slaked. Alyssa was so stuffed, she couldn't even force her current handful into her mouth. Instead, she closed her fist, giggling at the blood oozing from her clenched fingers. She sat down. Cindy was almost entirely forgotten in her excitement. And the excitement didn't let her rest. The moment her supple ass touched the ground, instantly compacting the vehicles below, she felt a need to see and feel tiny people die by her hand.

And a brilliant idea sprang to mind, inspired by her pendant. Alyssa rose, her tight latex clothing giving off squeaks with every movement. She strode over to the nearest highway, bulldozing through a skyscraper that had yet to fall to her monster movie antics. She deemed the eight land highway suitably full, the understatement of the century. Alyssa placed an enormous black shoe on either side of the road, gazing happily down at the terrified people below.

With an earth-shaking thud, she dropped to her knees. Then she pushed them outward, through buildings and factories on the sides of the highway until she felt her bottom connect with the highway. The people running appeared a little larger now. Their expressions caused Alyssa another spurt of giggling. Sobering, she began her next move. She slowly lowered her chest towards a particularly dense cluster of cars and refugees. She inhaled sharply as her enormous mounds softly gave way before street signs and lights before snapping them from their mounts in the concrete. The tiny people still fled, even though their fate was as good as sealed.

Feeling a different kind of excitement, Alyssa moaned as she felt the first gentle brush of cars on the tips of her latex-clad breasts. She savored each groan of tortured metal as her two 3,800 pound boobs pressed down on them. Just barely restraining herself, Alyssa forced her descent to remain slow. She felt cars give way, their roofs caving in, tires popping, suspensions breaking, metal twisting outward.

"Hello Samantha." the young women said in a soft voice.

It was the same voice she heard before. The same voice that told her to turn around. The women was beautiful - even Samantha had to admit that. Probably even more than she was. The feeling of hatred came up in her. How did this women dared to be prettier than she was?! Cindy smiled.

"Don't hate me for what I am." She said gently.

"I have chosen you to be the one to protect my belongings." She said calmly. "I want to make you a present. Something you desire most above everything"

"I love presents. Give it to me and maybe I'll like it."

"It is not that easy, Samantha. Your life will change completely."

"That's it. I like my life as it is. Goodbye." Sam turned around and walked to her car.

"Stop." she heard the voice in her head again.

"Cut the crap! I'm leaving!" she yelled.

"Hi Barry." She greeted him in her sweet charming voice, but his gaze was completely fixed onto the new girl. He walked straight up to the stranger.

"Barren, darling. This women here is harassing me would you please... What the fuck?!"

"He seems to know what I am." the women said casually. "You won't need this shoelicker anymore if you take my present. In fact you have no choice." She lifted the sole of her shoe and immediately Barren tried to reach it with his tongue. Then he kissed the tip of her boot and got up.

In the past, she had managed to conquer entire galaxies worth of planets with the help of the alien emperors fleets, and this world would inevitably fall to her just as all the others had.

Cindy smirked as she did a mental scan of the planet and saw just how small and pathetic this world and its inhabitants were. She would own this rock within a week. Moments later, Cindy received a call through her communicator. Answering the call, she heard the voice of her emperor speaking to her in alien tongue.

"Have you reached your destination. my child?" The emperor asked.

"Yes, my master." Cindy replied loyally.

"Good... Now, since this world is so small and its inhabitants so weak, I trust that you can handle this mission without the need of my reinforcements?"

"Of course, master. These bugs pose no threat to me. You needn't waste any more of your troops on this mission. I alone am more than enough."

"Excellent... Now, see to it that every last living being on that puny planet kneels before you. You have already captured so many worlds for me, my dear Cindy. Complete this one last mission for me, and I shall have you promoted to be my loyal second in command. I look forward to seeing your great success, child."

"Thank you, master. I promise that I shall not disappoint you." Cindy replied.

She then turned off the transmitter and walked toward the nearest land, which happened to be a Russian territory. As soon as she reached land, she noticed that there was a group of people on the ground below her who were running away in terror. They were a small police force that had been sent in to apprehend a pair of criminals who had escaped to the beach.

Of course, when a giant woman suddenly appeared before them, they were far to terrified to think about the prisoners at all. The only thing they cared about was escaping to preserve their own lives. Cindy smirked at their feeble attempt at self-preservation before reaching into her pocket and pulling out her weapon of choice: a powerful alien ray gun that eclipsed all human weapons in both firing rate and destructive power.

"Take this, earthling scum!" Cindy said.

She then shot a single beam at the ground in front of the fleeing police force, causing a massive explosion that vaporized the entire crowd instantly. 1443.content:
Linda Smith was exhausted. She had just managed to finish contact with the members of the new particle acceleration machine research team on the West Coast, and she was quite exhausted. She had spent all day trying to obtain data from rival accelerator machines, like Tevatron and the CERN facilities. She was trying to create a formula that would allow her to find every type of fundamental constant, force, and particle in the universe! If successful, Linda would surely be recognized as the greatest scientist in human history!

She could already see the Nobel Prize in her hand now. The attractive auburn was reclining in her seat, and was about to take a short nap when something interesting happened. The world around her turned blurry, and then disappeared in a flash of light. When the light subsided, Linda found herself in the middle of the city, and she quickly realized that she had grown to giant size.

Linda took a moment, looked around, and was surprised when she saw another female figure of equally giant size wearing a suit straight out of a sci-fi movie. She carefully walked over to get a closer look at this other woman, and observed that the other female had pointed ears. Straightening her lab coat and adjusting her glasses, Linda slowly reached out to touch this giant woman to make sure that she was actually real, and not just some stress-induced hallucination that she was seeing due to overworking herself.

As soon as her fingers came into contact with the woman's chest and sank into the plush skin of her fairly bountiful breast, a broad smile spread across Linda's face. It wasn't a hallucination. This woman was real. Forget particle acceleration, Linda had just made the first human contact with a real live alien lifeform! That Nobel Prize was as good as hers!

Just then...
1443.title: Choice 3: a famous scientist

14432.content:
"Would you please remove your hand from my chest, human?" Cindy said suddenly, surprising Linda and making her immediately pull her hand back.

"M-my apologies, Miss. It's just that, well, I've been sleep deprived for the past few days, so I wanted to make sure that you were really there and that I wasn't just seeing things. Please forgive me for my indecent actions, Miss. I meant you no disrespect." Linda said, bowing her head repeatedly as she apologized to the alien woman.

Linda was absolutely terrified that her absentminded actions may have just angered this alien woman and potentially even ruined humanity's chances of establishing peace with her race. However, as she felt the gentle touch of the alien woman's hand resting calmly on her shoulder, she stopped bowing and stood back up to look the alien visitor in the eye, adjusting her glasses once again as they had been shaken out of place by her bowing.

"Please human, there is no need to act with such formality. The entire reason that I grew you to my size was so that we could converse together as equals. You needn't treat me any differently than you would a member of your own kind." The woman said, removing her hand from Linda's shoulder and holding it out before her.

Linda, still in shock from everything that was happening at once, simply stared at the woman's hand in confusion. Cindy cocked her head to the side.

"From what I understand, this gesture is a symbol of friendship among your kind. Am I incorrect?" Cindy questioned.

"O-oh, no, you're right. This is just all so sudden. I... I just can't believe that I'm actually talking to a real live alien." Linda replied, taking Cindy's hand and shaking it. "I'm Linda Smith. Pleasure to make your acquaintance, Miss."

"Cindy. Likewise." Cindy said with a smile, releasing her grip on Linda's hand.

"So, Cindy, mind if I ask what brings you here to earth?"

"Not at all. You see, I was traveling through space making an interstellar map, and as I passed by your planet I sensed the presence of many different lifeforms that have never been recorded before. You see, I am an avid researcher, and one of my goals is to one day create a catalog of every species of life to ever exist within the universe. It's not as difficult a task as you might think. Most planets capable of housing life only have a handful of species to catalog, and many of those lifeforms exist on multiple worlds across the universe. Out of the hundreds of worlds I've visited to date, yours is one of only ten planets to contain more than five different species of life. It's also the first one I've encountered to date to have such an enormous magnitude of different lifeforms not yet recorded to exist on any other planet. And that brings me to why I've decided to make contact with you. Cataloging all of the species on your planet would take me far too long as an individual task, so I would like to request your assistance in this matter."

"My assistance?"

"Yes. I would like you to teach me as much as you can about your world and all the creatures that inhabit it. Sentient lifeforms especially. I want to know everything that there is to know about your world. Would you please lend me your knowledge, Linda Smith?"

Linda's eyes lit up with excitement. This was something that she had always dreamed of. An opportunity to spend time talking with and getting to know an alien lifeform on a personal level.

"Certainly, Cindy. I would gladly help you out with this mission of yours. But in exchange for teaching you about my world, I would like you to teach me about yours. Oh, and you don't need to call me Linda Smith. Linda will do just fine." Linda said.

"That seems like a fair deal to me. Very well, Linda, I believe that this alliance will be mutually beneficial. Where shall we begin?"

"How about we start with..."

She is a skilled fighter, but refuses to use her fighting skills unless the situation absolutely demands it. She is mostly friendly but sometimes she is a bit shy. Upon meeting the tiny earthlings, she may try to peacefully spread her religion to them and enhance their lives, or be disgusted by how they would rather kill eachother off in pointless wars than work together and force her religion on them as a means of unifying them. Whichever girl she chooses as her apprentice will have to be one who agrees with her religion and will help her spread it to the rest of the world.

2) Business giantess: She travels through many planets to make deals with other alien life. She learned about the planet earth during a conversation with one of the colleagues she works with. She only has one thing on her mind: profit, and she will do just about anything if it means that she can make a nice amount of money. Rather she decides to capture the tiny earthlings and sell them off to other aliens as slave labor, offer herself to them as a one woman workforce in exchange for mass amounts of cash, or sell herself as a weapon to a particular country's military, she won't be leaving earth until she breaks the bank. Whichever girl she chooses as her apprentice will need to be a very intelligent and shrewd businesswoman who could aid her with a detailed understanding of earth's economy

3) Defector giantess: She was once a soldier in an army of giantesses until she defected from them and ran away. She has hidden on many planets, only to be inevitability found and forced to run more. Eventually she discovered the planet earth during her all of her running, and decided to make it her newest hideout. Upon discovering that the planet is inhabited by such tiny and weak beings as humans, she may try to force us to cover for her and hide her from her pursuers, or she may use her powers to turn the human females into her own personal army to fight back. In the former scenario, her apprentice would need to be a woman with a position of power in earth's government so that she could use her influence to get her way. In the latter scenario, She would grow as many females as possible and pick the most skilled warrior among them to be her apprentice, who would help her whip the rest into shape and lead the army by her side.

4) Chef giantess: Cindy, a well known giantess chef, came to earth to show more people some of the best dishes from her home world while also learning some of the culinary arts of this planet. She takes on a female as her apprentice in order to teach them all of her recipes so that she can spread them across the earth long after she leaves, and also hopefully have her explain as many recipes for earth delicacies as possible.

5) other.

151.title: Giantess on pilgrimage

choices: Jasmine: Easy to win over, but hard adapt to her new role.
Natsuki: Hard to win over, but easy to adapt to her new role.

1512.content:
In the far distance of the galaxy, Cindy was on a religious pilgrimage to achieve self-enlightenment. Throughout her quest she went to from planet to planet in order to see and help people who were being brought down by sickness, war, and other evil things. As she was in the midst of wandering the milky way, aimlessly searching for the next planet that she would provide her aid to, she sensed an intense sadness far from where she was. Feeling the overwhelming sadness, Cindy placed her hand over her necklace's pendant, a silver circle with two angelic wings on the side and a golden cross in the center, and clutched it tightly.

"This sadness... I must go see it!" Cindy said.

She then flew off toward the planet where she felt it. Once she arrived on the planet, a small little globe known by its natives as earth, she was surprised to see just how beautiful it looked. It was a world of blue oceans and green continents in perfect balance with one-another. Cindy smiled, but at the same time she frowned little as she remembered the pain that she had felt coming from this world.

Once she landed in the ocean she walked toward the nearest city in order to meet with the native people who were in so much pain. Not wanting to cause any damage to this world and its inhabitants, Cindy quickly cast a spell that caused her body to float a few inches off of the ground so that nothing would be damaged beneath her mighty footsteps. As she floated forward, she paused as something came to mind...

'I do want to spread my religion and help these people in the name of self enlightenment, but I cannot do it by myself... There is simply too much sadness in this world for one person to resolve...' Cindy thought.

Just then, she had an idea that would resolve that issue.

'If I alone am not enough to save this world, then I will simply need to get some assistance from one of this world's natives. I shall take one of these poor lost souls under my wing, teach them the ways of my goddess, and have them aid me in my mission to save this world.'

Cindy immediately decided that this would be the best course of action. She would pick one person from the ground below and let that mortal become her apprentice to spread her religion far and wide. It was simple idea, but at the same time it was a grand one. Cindy looked around with a smile on her face, and after a bit of searching, she finally found three people that she would be interested in adopting as her apprentice.


---------------------------------------------------------------------------- -------------------------------------------------------------------------------- --------------------
Jasmine: Jasmine is an average 16 year old who just started high school. She has light brown hair, a white shirt and a long green skirt on. She was always bullied since she was in elementary school, but she endured it as she was not a fighter. She wishes that someday she could spread the word of anti-bullying through school or even through society in general, but she doubts that she will ever be in a position of power that would allow her to do that.

Natsuki: Natsuki is an 18 year old girl who is half Japanese and half american. She has short black hair, slightly slanted brown eyes and is usually seen wearing her school uniform. She moved to America six years ago when her parents went there for the religious mission, and Natsuki has always wanted to become a pastor like her father was. She is purely against war in all forms and has attempted to spread her words through the college that she was accepted in.

Beatrice: Beatrice is a 17 year old girl who immigrated from Italy to America. She has long dark brown hair, hazelnut eyes and usually wears a simple black and white dress. She is currently enrolled in a private all girls Christian school, and she always admired the religion of peace. She wished someday she would be able to help the pastor of the school to spread the peaceful religion without harming anybody.
---------------------------------------------------------------------------- -------------------------------------------------------------------------------- --------------------


Cindy thought carefully as it was truly hard decision. Jasmine didn't have a religion of her own, so she would be the easiest of the three to convert. However, she was also the shyest of the three, and it might be difficult for her if she were suddenly pulled from her normal life and told that she would be playing a role in changing her world forever. Natsuki did have a religion of her own, and it wasn't exactly one that lined up with Cindy's teachings. Converting her would probably be incredibly difficult, but she seemed to be the most passionate of the three, so winning her over would probably be the most beneficial in the long run. As for Beatrice, it seemed that her belief in this earthling religion of Christianity was very similar in nature to Cindy's religion. Converting her probably wouldn't be too hard as a result, and she seemed like she would be a very helpful assistant once won over.

Cindy thought it over from all angles before finally deciding to pick...
1512.title: Teenage apprentice of a religious giantess

15121.content:

She spoke few words and then she breathed out little on the hand, making a calm wind that would go to the shy girl. At the high school, Jasmine got out of the building since the class were over. She just started the school since she started the school year late due to the bullying issue that was going on. Jasmine felt depressed as she was bullied again today. She was punched, kicked, haired pulled and got hit with binder. The first task they would do is..

Wanting to know what exactly was going on, and assuming that that other giantess probably had something to do with her sudden massive growth spurt, Natsuki began to approach the fellow giantess and question her. 15221.title: New business partner

153.content:
Cindy cursed under her breath as she flew through the galaxy at top speed. Those rotten military drones just wouldn't leave her alone. Ever since she left she had been labeled as a traitor to her kind. Just because she was sick of all the meaningless wars and decided she didn't want to fight anymore, she was being targeted for extermination.

Of course they couldn't let her live. She knew vital military information that, if it got into the hands of one of her race's enemies, would most certainly spell their demise. She had no intention of ever revealing those secrets, mind, but they weren't willing to take any chances.

However, they had made one big mistake when they began to pursue her: They had sent drones rather than actual troops after her. Certainly, those drones were powerful, and far more persistent than any living being would ever be, but the fact that they were machines meant that they were unable to adapt beyond what they were programmed to do.

These drones were meant to pursue and apprehend a fleeing unarmed target. They had no ranged combat protocol at the ready, and so they had no way to react when Cindy reached into her pocket and pulled out a pair of tiny laser guns just slightly larger than her fingernails.

Turning around mid-flight without ever slowing down at all, Cindy used her powers of size to return these pistols back to their original size. She then took quick aim at each of the drones and fired. The drones, not knowing what to do in the face of ranged weaponry that their target wasn't even supposed to possess, simply flew straight into the barrage of beams that reduced each of them to little more than giant metal hunks of swiss cheese.

With a satisfied grin on her face, Cindy turned back around and continued flying away. She knew she wasn't safe yet. The instant that the military lost the signal from those drones, they would surely send a second wave after her. Probably actual troops this time rather than just simple drones.

Cindy needed to find a planet that she could use as sanctuary, and fast. Luckily for her, as soon as she turned around, she caught a glimpse of a little blue planet somewhere off in the distance. She immediately set herself on course to land on that planet. With any luck, there would be some form of intelligent life that could aid her in hiding from her pursuers.

After a long flight through space, Cindy finally touched down on the surface of the planet known as earth, having landed right near one of the planet's many beaches. She immediately did a mental sweep of the surrounding area, and discovered that there was a city nearby.

As she approached the city and got a closer look at it, Cindy discovered that this world's inhabitants were all surprisingly small. Small enough to hold in the palm of her hand. How very interesting...

Cindy shook her head as she refocused herself on the reason she was here in the first place. She had no time to be sightseeing or admiring the tiny locals, she needed to make preparations for the arrival of pursuit wave two.

Thinking about that, she realized that maybe she could use these tiny people to her advantage. As much as she didn't want to drag them into a war that had nothing to do with them, Cindy was currently desperate, and really didn't have any other options.

Coming to the conclusion that taking advantage of these natives was her only hope of losing her pursuers once and for all, Cindy began to think about what exactly she could do. There was a significant number of women among them who she could use her powers to grow into her own personal army. Or perhaps she could find one of their female government leaders and grow her in hopes of forging an alliance and using her influence to get these people to help hide her from her pursuers. Maybe she could just shrink herself down to their size and hide among them that way.

After a fair bit of thought, Cindy finally decided to...

The hologram nodded and map appeared. The hologram then stepped in and pointed at one of the continent with her pointer.

"This land is called United States of America. They are one of the big continent, and they also have a good resources and good war technology." Hologram spoke.

She then turned to other country.

Then she pointed at the last area.

1533.content:
After a fair bit of thought, Cindy decided to shrink herself down so that she could hide among the people of this planet.

At first she hesitated a little, as when she was growing up her people had always drilled into her a fierce sense of pride, a belief that she was superior to all other life in the universe. She was a member of the one ultimate species and so to reduce herself to the level of another inferior species, much less one as pathetic as humans, was something that her pride just couldn't get over.

Cindy immediately shoved her hesitant feelings aside, however, quickly realizing that this was an emergency situation and that her life was was far more important than her pride. Swallowing her pride, she began chanting a spell that would cause her to shrink. A light glowed around her and she started to shrink down to 6'1".

Once the light faded away, Cindy looked around and saw that there was a crowd of people beginning to form around her. She quickly ran through the streets for a few minutes until she was sure that she had escaped the eyes of her observers. Once she turned down a dark alley, she paused to reexamine her situation.

"I need better view..." Cindy said.

She squatted, putting strength on her legs and jumped very high so fast the people didn't noticed it. She then reached the top and landed on the ceiling then turned around. She Observed the city as it was truly a big metro-police in her height. She then quickly brainstormed on how to integrate into this society so she could hide from the pursuers.

"Lets see... I'll have to temporarily seal my powers so those bastards at the HQ won't detect me with a scan." Cindy said, "And then I have to find a place to live." Cindy spoke to herself.

She then took out her communicator and dialed some numbers. Moment later, a hologram of female in good cloth appeared. Her name was Jeanne, Cindy's intelligent partner. She always gave her advice, done the plans through digitally and such. Jeanne smiled and bowed to Cindy.

"I'm glad to see you, master." Jeanne said, "Are you safe now?"

"For now, yes." Cindy replied, knowing that she was aware of situation. "I'm in the planet earth. Can you scan the area and tell me where I am?"

Jeanne looked back and observed the area. Moment later, she turned back with continued smile.

"Master Cindy, You're in..."

15523.content:
In the galaxy where earth floated peacefully, a giantess watched over the blue planet. She was Cindy, the most renowned movie director on her own planet, famous throughout the entire universe for creating some of the best movies in history. She had directed many movies in the past, and she came to earth because she heard from her colleague that the planet would make a great set for her next big project: a giantess movie. She thought for a moment before nodding her head and reaching into her pocket, carefully pulling something out. In her palm sat her entire movie crew, who she had shrunken down to a miniature size so they could be carried around easily by Cindy herself.

"Let's make this movie a big hit like always, girls." Cindy said enthusiastically.

Cindy heard her tiny crew shouting and cheering. With a smile on her face, she placed them back into her pocket and flew toward earth. She landed on the planet in the middle of an ocean, and looked off into the distance. She soon located a big city and headed toward it. Once she reached solid land, Cindy looked around and smiled once again. Retrieving her crew from her pocket once again, she set them down on the ground below her and sent them off into the city to look for locations that would be ideal for shooting.

Their miniaturized size was for more than just travel purposes. At that size, they would be able to film amazing shots from the perspective of the puny humans that would be getting terrorized by her giantess star, and they could capture the action from a far wider variety of angles than anyone of her stature could. While she was amazing at picking out talented actors and pulling everyone together, they were the ones who were best at being able to tell which locations would be best for which shots.

Now all that remained was to find that one perfect woman to fill the role of her giantess star. She needed a mature beauty, one with unparalleled acting talent and a willingness to follow any order her director gave her for the success of the film. Most importantly, however, she would need to be willing to cast aside her humanity and truly become a giantess. Part of what made Cindy's movies so great was that nothing she filmed was ever faked.

Authenticity was the one thing that she prided herself on more than anything else. If a scene required a city be destroyed by a towering goddess, she would find a real city and have it destroyed. For the movie she had in mind, her star would eventually end up conquering the entire planet and ending countless human lives. Certainly, she would restore everything to normal with her powers once all was said and done, but her star would need to be able to handle the idea of singlehandedly wiping out her own kind, even if only temporarily.

With that in mind, Cindy scanned the city to see if there was anyone nearby who fit her strict criteria and would become the universe's next big super star. After a few minutes of searching. she found 2 favorable candidates:

Zelda McRauld - a 28 year old with long blond hair, gorgeous figure and deep blue eyes. She was born in a small town and moved to the city when she was 12. She grew up loving acting as her parents were also actors, and from the very beginning she was a prodigy in the field. After she graduated high school she enrolled in the acting school and graduated at age 26 and now she is ready for the movie career. She has always felt a bit disconnected from the world around her due to how much more naturally everything came for her. She would probably take naturally to the idea of becoming a giant goddess wiping out those who were inferior to her, but maybe she might feel a bit nervous about actually ending the lives of real people.

Mackenzie Kim - a 30 year old with short black hair and green eyes. She is a korean american who grew up in the world of acting. She has been in many plays and acted in one of the most famous musicals on broadway. She loves movies and plays of all genres. Acting is her passion, and she takes it far more seriously than anything else. Once she gets a part, she fully transforms herself into the role. As long as her performance is utterly flawless, she doesn't care if anyone else gets hurt in the process. They were merely a necessary sacrifice for her own success, and naturally they should be honored to sacrifice themselves for the success of one as talented and dedicated as her, right?

Cindy thought hard for moment and then decided to pick..
15523.title: Destination: earth

155232.content:
After a bit of thought, Cindy picked Mackenzie. She felt that she would probably be the most reliable person to become a giantess actress. Talented and dedicated as Zelda was, she may still let her human inhibitions get in the way of her acting in such a role. Mackenzie, on the other hand, had already proven that she was willing to put the success of her performance before anything else. If she had to trample millions of innocent lives beneath her feet to make this movie a success, she gladly would do so.

Making her decision, Cindy used her powers to bring the future star to her.

Mackenzie was just getting out of the theater. She had a meeting with one of the directors, where she was offered the opportunity to become the heroine of the their upcoming movie. Always one to keep her options open, Mackenzie told them that she'd think about it and left.

"What a day... It's not easy being so talented... Now, what should I do next?" Mackenzie spoke to herself.

She then felt a light breeze, and once she blinked her eyes she was no longer in the city anymore, but instead on the shore of the beach.

"Wha... What just happened?!" Mackenzie said, looking around in shock.

She then saw a massive giantess with pointy ears whose feet covered by the ocean water! What surprised her even more was when she looked back at herself and realized that she had become a giantess as well!

Who speaks first?

"Right on it!" Natsumi spoke.

She flipped her wings many time, causing an tornado like gust against the monster. The monster were enduring the attack and once natsumi finished flapping, the monster were ready to unleash the attack.

The two had the power struggle with the beam but ultimately, the beam that natsumi shot overwhelmed the monsters beam and engulfed it, hitting the invading monster directly and killing it. Once the beam were gone and everyone knew that the monster were finished, the civilians and the military cheered for natsumizilla. Once turned, Natsumi saw an white sphere thing floating on top of the monsters body.

"Cindy, what's that?" Natsumi asked.

"That's the monsters soul. Every time when you defeat the monster, it unleashes its soul." Cindy replied, "It is also my food."

Natsumi were surprised to hear this and cindy explained to her that her kind of kaiju is special one that eats the monsters and kaijus soul so they could become more stronger and wiser. Natsumi felt skeptical about this but just followed Cindys words.

"Now then, will you please go to that soul and eat it." Cindy spoke.

"O..ok.." Natsumi obeyed.

She walked toward the monsters soul and grabbed it. The soul were squishy and moving little, making Natsumi feel little skeptical about eating it but shook off her feeling as it was for the safety of the world. She then opened her mouth and touched the soul to her lips, then suddenly the soul were sucked into her mouth, making natsumi surprised and instantly swallowing the soul. Natsumi coughed little and then started to feel warm within her stomach.

"Ahh.... I can feel my body regenerate more thanks to the soul you ate." Cindy said.

"I see that you're recovering." Natsumi responded.

"Indeed. And I do not hope you would misunderstanding this process." Cindy spoke, "I'm not eating the souls for fun, but for my nourishment."

"I understand." Natsumi replied.

"Well, just lately, I lost my parents when the house was on fire, and it was just two days ago, now I been alone on the streets with no place to call a home." Cindy then got the thought then that might just cheer her up. She does need an student, and perhaps a girl wanting peace can do it. Plus Mary wouldn't have to feel lonely at all. They talked for moment and then they were taken back to the normal world. Just then...

This got the two interested right at this very moment, and they want to know what is going on now.

"Our Daibijin kaiju girl known as Soyumi will be joining you two tomorrow in showing the ropes on how to do the show. Now to admit, we have done the Tokyo shows before, and other parts of the world, but this year you are the first two to do it, and Soyumi would like to see you two at the VC right now so she can show you the ropes on how the shows go on." She then sees both Sonia and Mary can then she smiles just as she comes by.

"Say, it is about time you two came along for the show teachings." Soyumi smiled. Mary and Sonia smiled back to her.

"To give you some insite right now, Soyumi is our most precicous kaiju and the most popular of them all. Her kaiju name is Daibijin. She was created when some alien bit her and gave her this size. Thankfully she can turn back to human form at any time." Narika said before she left. "I hope you girls can play well with each other."

Soyumi smiles just as she roars like a giant monster then turns to Maryzilla and Soniazilla. "Okay, since she is out of here, I can begin teaching you the ropes. Now I must admit (note that Soyumi is the same size as Soniazilla) that you all can rampage really good, especially you Maryzilla, but we are really going to be entertaining the crowd tomorrow, so I want you to be as monstrous as possible. So we are going to work on your..."

-Government office-

In the government office, Narika was called by the secretarys and high ranking officials to the meetings. She was told it was emergency and once she got to the meeting room, they greeted her and she bowed, then sitting to the proper seat. As she sat, the senator from Osaka prefecture stood up to start the emergency meeting.

"I have called this emergency meeting to say that the unknown entity is starting to come toward the planet earth." Senator spoke.

"What? what do you mean unknown entity?" Narika asked.

The senator dimmed the light and pressed the button, showing the picture of the shadow that looked round and mutated thing flying through the sky. The people and narika didn't know what this were as the senator spoke up.

"This was taken by the astrologer at the Niigata prefecture in chubu region. He don't know what this thing is, and he fears it might comes to Tokyo tomorrow afternoon." Senator spoke.

Narika were worried since the show was starting tomorrow morning. She was thinking hard and the senator spoke to the lady.

"Well? Are you going to deploy your kaijyu girls to defend japan, Mrs.Fuushin?" Senator asked.

Narika thought for moment and then stood up.

"It is critical to see whether or not this unknown entity is friendly or not. I will deploy Rakuna, the senior member of the youkaiden, and Alice Burgmen to fight if it needed." Narika spoke.

"That will be good." Senator spoke, "now then... we all should go back to our business."

They all bowed and left while narika was finding a good words to tell the girls at the youkaiden about possible cancellation of the show...

15533111121121212211111121121.content:
Back in the youkaiden, Mary and others were taking an 15 minute break after all the rampage they have done. Inside mary, cindy were surprised to see another kaijyu that were fairly tough. Cindy swore to her heart to destroy all evil while her master helped her train to achieve the goal. When she opened her eyes, she felt something that were more powerful then ever, and it was truly familiar.

Outside where Narika was walking, she was on cellphone talking to the defence minister about how to put down the effective plan. She then closed her phone and when she was about to waive for taxi, she heard someone's voice.

"You their, with good cloth!"

Narika turned around and saw a young girl with white hair and grey hair sitting at the bench smoking some cigarette(http://www.pixiv.net/member_illust.php?m...). Narika was truly in disbeliefe that a young girl like her is smoking a cigarette, but she was calm. The young girl puffed some smoke and then talked to her with smile.

"Aren't you the lady who keeps the kaijyu girls to the Japanese style mansion?" Girl asked.

"How do you know that? Who are you?" Narika replied, questioning her.

She laughed and puffed more cigarette and threw it away. She lift herself up and then walked toward narika and stopped infront of her. Narika felt odd about this girl as if she had very young body, she had some sort of long experience with something that she couldn't explain.

"Sorry for the late intro. My name is Porozi, and I know you since...well, I've seen you since you started the whole kaijyu training thing." She replied.

Narika was surprised to hear that from this young girl. How did she know that herself was the senior of the Tokyo Special Intelligiance Committee. Porozi then smiled and snapped her finger, revealing a cigarette at her right arm and put it to her mouth. She lighted with small lighter and when she put it away, she looked at narika.

"Anyway, I'm here because I have heard one of my apprentice came here to defend the city." Porozi said, "Do you know where she is?"

"Your....apprentice?" Narika asked.

"You know, the one with scaly tails and fangs sticking out?" Porozi spoke.

Narika remembers what happened other day, and then turned her attention to the girl. She now realized that this girl was not an ordinary girl but more then just a normal girl.

"Then...you're.." Narika spoke.

"Just to be clear, I'm not kaijyu." Porozi said, "I am immortal who lived as a hermit in the providence of Sichuan since the early 1400s."

She was truly amazed to hear this and offered her to come to the youkaiden. Porozi took the offer and got the taxi to go to the dormitory.

She was dressed in an incredibly figure hugging bodysuit, with boots to the knee over the trousers, gloves to the elbow over the top and a belt which seemed to have some kind of weapon attached and the top was unzipped revealing an awe inspiring cleavage, emphasized by an incredibly large pendant round her neck, and was standing there gloved hands on hips and seemed to be looking straight at Soyumi. The other very obvious feature was her size, she had to be at least 100 feet (30 metres) tall. And had used he size to crash through the neighbouring streets to get where she was now as her boots rested on several squashed cars, the debris of shattered houses littering the landscape behind her for quite a way (up to what appeared to be portal which was closing as we speak).

The creature fiddled with the pendant and began to speak.

"Hiiiiiii, I'm Cindy, and I would like you to help me destroy the world".

"Whoah! Extreme!", thought Soyumi.

Cindy saw the body language...."let me explain, excuse my directness but that is how we are. My job is conquest, to lay waste planets, as a form of worship to our chief goddess and to provide eventual living space as our race grows in numbers, and this seems an eminently suitable place to smash and destroy and exterminate the life forms. To show us around and to help our conquests, we have a programme to develop apprentices. We have ways of researching suitable people and you seemed to be he perfect fit...."

Soyumi again was open mouthed, she couldn't believe what she was hearing. She looked again at the creature, she was beautiful, and let what she had heard sink in. After being the confines of prison and fellow inmates and guards, Cindy was refreshing and Soyumi felt something stir in her, something tingling in her being, and as she thought about what she had heard she began to like it, to thrill to it, what an opportunity....

"Sure..."....Soyumi answered.

Cindy smiled......."don't move, don't be afraid, just stay there", as she said hat she knelt down onto the street with a resounding crash and clutching the prison wall not too carefully such that it partially collapsed and took hold of Soyumi and hoisted her high. Getting up again she brought her to her face, and Cindy smiled, Soyumi was beautiful as well and very quickly put the 4 inch Soyumi to her lips and kissed her. Soyumi didn't know how to react, it was all happening so quickly, but before any further thoughts crossed her mind Soyumi felt something........she looked at herself, she was growing.......Cindy put Soyumi down beside her and she continued growing. It didn't take long for her to reach Cindy's height when the growth stopped. Soyumi looked at her self, same Soyumi, same leather clothes but......as she looked around and down, she smiled....and she too had booted feet on squashed cars......

"Like it?"

"Yeah........."
1553312221.title: Soyumi Nataokne

15533122211.content:
"Hey this is so cool!" exclaimed Soyumi as she put gloved hands on hips and lifted a boot off the ground and watched a couple of cars peel off and crash to the ground, "and heehee look at those people running away......from me.....from us", she looked at Cindy, "they are scared ****less", she made a half-hearted attempt to step on them, but missed this time, "just how I like it", she laughed.

“Hey, before we grow some more, would you like to try your new size out? Destroy some stuff? I know so much about you and want to see what you are made of?”, said Cindy, gloved hands on slim catsuit covered hips. Soyumi thought she noticed Cindy slightly biting her lip, surely not. But she said the word grow, now that sounded brilliant.

It didn’t take the 100ft tall Soyumi much time to start. First she stepped on more cars, delighting in the crunch, making sure they were as flat as possible and merging with the crumbled tarmac, there was an extra frisson of excitement in her when she noticed splashes of red in the mix. She sauntered along the street stepping on things and stroking her gloved hands on some buildings lining the street watching masonry fall on to the ground below adding to the panic. She had been surprisingly a little hesitant to start with, not quite sure how to proceed, or maybe she still couldn’t believe what had happened to her and that she was now able to do this, but quite quickly she warmed to it, now shoving over buildings with abandon, crashing through houses, stepping on cars and people, and gradually laughs and giggles joined the sounds of panic and destruction in the air.

“****ing destroy the b******s”, said Cindy under her breath, watching her new protégé so freely exercising her new size. Soyumi thought she heard Cindy say something but again discounted it. Soyumi felt liberated as she smashed the neighbourhood with abandon, delighting in destroying buildings, infrastructure, people and their lives and livelihoods, delighting at last in being to destroy her fellow human beings and playing her part in bringing the world down for all she felt it had done to her.

Cindy couldn’t resist….shutting her eyes she willed Soyumi to grow…..Cindy herself grew alongside.

“****! This is amazing!”, Soyumi said as she looked at herself as she expanded further. The she glimpsed Cindy growing likewise……..

The 2 of them grew and grew….200ft, 300ft………….at 600ft they both stopped. Soyumi was speechless. She looked around, her boots were buried in the wreckage of several apartment blocks, houses looked so steponable, most structures were shorter than her, and cars….she picked up a few and felt them crunch as she squeezed them in her gloved hand and let them fall……and people…..hahahahaha she thought………each a squishable 2/3 inch high……She looked at Cindy who smiled.

“I so enjoyed watching you do that, baby”, said Cindy. “You’re so ****ing awesome, you know, you’ve passed the first test with flying colours. You realise I haven’t grown many of my apprentices so soon, but it was, like, so appropriate”. Soyumi thought she could see Cindy biting her lip again……….

“Now wait there, I’ll come over, I have more for you……”. Without hesitation Cindy sauntered over to where Soyumi was standing transfixed, smashing all in her path, why bother walking round, she was tall enough and powerful enough and anyway, inferior beings and their surroundings really weren’t important……….

Amnesia Giantess: She can't remember why she's a giantess or how to use her special powers to grow others.

Marooned Giantess: A giantess left for dead by her crew, either because of betrayal on their end or treason on hers.

Owner of a Pet Shop: A giantess looking for new pets for her intergalactic market.

Speculator Giantess: A giantess looking for a suitable planet for new real estate for her overpopulated species.

Game Show Giantess: The head of an intergalactic game show heads to earth for her newest episode. (Rick and Morty's "Get Schwifty" could be a partial inspiration for this.)

Giantess Military Post: A giantess visits to scope out a new base in an intergalactic war.

Giantess Seeking a Cure: Her people are dying from disease, which she is looking for a cure for. She's found one in humans themselves or somewhere on earth.

Giant Mid-Life Crisis: A giantess arrives in a mid-life crisis looking for meaning in her life.

Giantess Looking for Adoption: A giantess who is unable to have kids decides to adopt a human, by growing her into a giantess and raising her herself.

Ruler from the Past: A long-lost advance civilization of humans gave her tribute, which stopped after humans lost the capability for space-travel. Enraged, she finally decides to come to earth to settle the matter.

info.brief_description: A giantess arrives on earth, and decides to take a human woman on as her pupil.
info.description:
One day, a giantess from outer space arrives on earth. Taking an interest in the much smaller creatures that called themselves humans, the alien goddess decides to take one of their females under her wing as an apprentice. After finding an ideal candidate from among the planet's populace, the giantess uses her power to grow the human woman to new heights. Now we follow the story of what happens between a goddess whose true intentions in coming to earth have yet to be revealed, and a normal woman who must now learn the ropes of being a giantess. Only time will tell how this pair will get along, and what they plan to do to the rest of the earth.

Okay, there's the basic premise of this story. I will allow almost anything, but I don't want any male giants or futa stuff. Other than that, I want you to keep the giantesses' personalities in line with whatever route has been chosen in the first chapter. I don't want them to spontaneously go from good to evil, or vice versa. Of course, I am willing to be a bit more lenient with the apprentice, as she may have difficulties adjusting to her new size. But once she has settled on how she feels about the situation, I don't want her to be switching back either.Also, no ending the story! Always leave an "other" option in case someone else wants to continue down a different route. Also, one last note: If I don't feel that the apprentices personality is fitting for the route chosen, I will edit it to fix the issue. I am fairly lenient and will almost never delete a chapter. At worst, I'll usually edit out any issues that I see in it.


A few things you should know about the alien goddess:
> She can alter the size of any object with her mind (this would be how she enlarges her apprentice)
> Her name is Cindy
> Her physical appearance is the same as a human, except she has pointed ears like an elf (I'll let you make up what the rest of her traits are, but that is the only major difference between her and a human woman)
> Her standard size is about 100 feet tall (but as mentioned above, she can alter her size with her mind to grow/shrink at will)
> She is able to communicate with people telepathically
> Her natural age is about 21 years old (by human standards, anyway), but she can alter her own age at will. Based on the age of her apprentice, she will change herself to be in the same age group


Note: I would like it if you made one of the first chapters in each route a "tutorial session" type chapter, where Cindy shows her apprentice the ins and outs of being a giantess. This isn't a requirement or anything (and I honestly may not even do it myself) but it is something that I would like to see.


In order to improve the reading experience, I'll try to correct any spelling and grammar mistakes I find. I also reserve the right to make minor alterations to chapters if it is necessary to insert detail or correct one of the above rules being broken. If a chapter is too poorly written for me to fix, then it will be deleted. Chapters that I have to delete will not qualify for the GP reward.
